## FieldColour.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `FieldColour` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_value?: string | Sentinel, opt_validator?: Function, opt_config?: FieldColourConfig);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_value | string \| Sentinel | <i>(Optional)</i> The initial value of the field. Should be in '\#rrggbb' format. Defaults to the first value in the default colour array. Also accepts Field.SKIP\_SETUP if you wish to skip setup (only used by subclasses that want to handle configuration and setting the field value after their own constructors have run). |
|  opt\_validator | Function | <i>(Optional)</i> A function that is called to validate changes to the field's value. Takes in a colour string &amp; returns a validated colour string ('\#rrggbb' format), or null to abort the change.Blockly. |
|  opt\_config | FieldColourConfig | <i>(Optional)</i> A map of options used to configure the field. See the \[field creation documentation\][https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/colour](https://developers.google.com/blockly/guides/create-custom-blocks/fields/built-in-fields/colour) for a list of properties this parameter supports. |
